page.title: 05THE AXMINSTER BYPASS
page.content: The Axminster Bypass. Axminster is a very old town with its foundations going back to pre Roman times.After a great fire in the earlt 19th century the centre around Trinity square was re built. However this Victorian center was not built to cope with 20thcentury traffic. Axminster has the main A35 trunk road running through it and the very large trucks that now run on the roads are not only damaging the road but also the builfings and polluting the environment. The biggest problem is that two lorries cannot pass each other easily in the towns narrow streets. During the summer months this causes considerabe congestion and makes it both dangerous and unpopular to tourists and locals alike.The government have promised t build a by pass for the lasttwenty years.
